Channel 9, Station KETC
St. Louis 5>, Missouri
August 12, 195U
Mr. Morris Novik
300 W. 23rd
NT, NY
Dear Morriej
I am sure that you received a copy of the IBEW contract X sent to you. We
did not settle on a specified number of people in each salary bracket, but we do
â€œJ*."1 *he contract, as you know, a sliding XXSX salary scale based on experience,
and the top salary figure is appreciably below the minimum in town.
We have had no contact with AFRA, and I am not initiating any contacts unless
you have any thoughts to the contrary.
How close are you to the AM situation? Has anything been done about this on
an educational television levelt I should like to get your thoughts about this.
Sincerely,
Richard J. Goggin
General Manager
